meanings.definition: A type of fish with a flat body and both eyes on the same side of the head.
meanings.sent1: The flatfish swam gracefully along the sandy ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flatfish while snorkeling in the clear blue sea.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flatfish bring a ruler to school? To measure the ocean!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as unexpected as a flatfish in a tree.
meanings.sent5: The flatfish's camouflage made it nearly invisible against the sand.

meanings.definition: A fish that is commonly found in oceans and seas.
meanings.sent1: Many tourists enjoy watching flatfish swim in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The flatfish population has been increasing in the nearby sea.
meanings.sent3: The flatfish told a joke to the crab, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was as deep as the ocean where flatfish roam.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the flatfish caught the sunlight beautifully.

meanings.definition: A type of seafood that is often cooked and eaten.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious flatfish dish with lemon.
meanings.sent2: I prefer grilled flatfish over other types of seafood.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flatfish refuse to share its meal? It was shellfish!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cooking flatfish filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was a perfectly seasoned flatfish fillet.
